Trim Both

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Modify - Trim Both
Shortcut: T, M
Commands: trim2 | extend2 | tm

Description:

Trims or extends two line, arc or ellipse entities to their intersection point.

Procedure:

  1. Choose the first entity to be trimmed.
  2. Choose the second entity to be trimmed.
  3. Right click twice or press Escape twice to terminate the tool.
